titles.title: Calling for the protection of human rights and restoration of rule of law in Pakistan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 12/4/2007--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the government of Pakistan should: (1) restore the rule of law by reinstating the constitution and members of the Supreme Court of Pakistan; (2) end the charges against human rights defenders and release those in detention or under house arrest, in particular Ms. Asma Jahangir; (3) restore media independence and ensure freedom of speech; and (4) ensure respect for human rights.
